title.rendered: Expat business owners pay rich tributes to UAE for empowering them

content.rendered: Dubai: Two expats are hoping to take their message of love and peace from Dubai to Ukraine where attacks from Russia over the past week have left thousands dead and millions displaced.

excerpt.rendered:
Dubai: Over a dozen expat business owners from different walks of life and nationalities got together at a special event on Monday ahead of the International Women’s Day to pay rich tributes to UAE for empowering them.

Learn More
